title: Banned for literally nothing but a small amount of crude humor.
body:
I was banned because I went into a normal game, did poorly and made a joke in relations to someone elses joke, I'm not toxic like literally at all this is what i got banned for.

Game 1 
Zaylee: are you a %%%got cause %%%got 
Zaylee: get it cause %%%got 
Zaylee: how am i reported lmao 
Zaylee: WAT 
Zaylee: IT WAS MEME 
Zaylee: ? 
Zaylee: who tf fed kat 
Zaylee: zz 
Zaylee: lmao 
Zaylee: ? 
Zaylee: im useless anywasy 
Zaylee: no 
Zaylee: i didnt mean it 
Zaylee: omb 
Zaylee: sorry i fed but u guys got kat rolling zz

Thoughts? and/or did I deserve to get banned ;( im not a toxic guy anymore. I don't think that this is a just cause for a 15 day ban. @riot if you could help me out.

replies.body: That's not even close to how the system works. Swear all you want.

Hey Tantram...do you mind addressing the dude that claim's being behind the "bait banning" and what not. I'm getting to the point where I'd want a T1 style ban for that dude in game and on the forums...
He's just a troll with a bunch of photoshopped screenshots and fake emails. Don't give him the attention he wants; I'm not. This is not a large issue.
Agreeing with truly just wanted to make sure he wasn't some legit asshole who actually was the one with the master plan XD
Kinda figured after he posted his "backstory". Still nice to see you confirm this.

I'd also like to point out there was a point where I had debated trying to find a way to abuse this bot when it was 1st released cause I KNEW someone would find a way to abuse it. Riot in my opinion was walking a fairly dangerous line with this bot.

> [{quoted}](name=CreampEye,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=v4aohdFO,comment-id=0006000200040001,timestamp=2017-11-04T06:36:39.361+0000)
>
> Who was holding that beer all weekend?
> 
> https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/375840504635457537/376253452117868545/unknown.png
> 
> In any case, stop giving this guy attention. Look at what is happening now:
> 
> https://pcgamesn.com/league-of-legends/league-of-legends-permanent-ban-tricks
> 
> https://www.eteknix.com/league-legends-players-baited-bans/
> 
> Just got another:
> https://imgur.com/a/V1ZWl
> 
> Providing training and advice:
> https://discord.gg/ggBw4F9

Why are you so thirsty for attention?

A. Probably wasn't raised right :P

B. Don't reply to their comments, that's just giving them attention. It's obviously fabricated anyway. Just your average trolling.
*below* average trolling.

If you need a funnier version, I got you covered (click the name in the quote for the source):

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=jl4Xsnyo,comment-id=0009000000030000,timestamp=2017-05-03T17:06:25.024+0000)
>Shit, shit, fuck.

In all seriousness, I swear a lot, too and never got punished. As long as you don't swear **at** somebody, you should be fine.
"Fuck, missed my skill shot" = okay
"Fuck you, you missed your skill shot" = not okay

have you thought about having a pop up whenever someone new opens player behavior boards with all the general information about what will get you banned so its more of people that actually want help instead of toxic people saying they didnt deserve it

As someone who has worked customer support in the past - it would help some, but some people will *always*, **always **believe they are an exception and didn't deserve the ban. You have to decide as a company if you'd rather just ignore all of those people, or spend many, many man-hours answering them.

Also I’ve agreed that this is somewhat wrong in using the word at all and I’m asking for a possible extensive chat restriction. I’m hoping a rioter will see that I have good character and throw me a bone.
The %%got word will ALWAYS send you to a straight suspension, no matter what. You're too late to be asking for a chat restriction unless you reform for the next 3 months.

Hey riot tantrum I’ve seen your posts, you seem like an understanding fellow, this is just a bad word out of context not used in a derrogatory way do you think this is just? Also could you explain the system so I can better understand how to follow the algorithm ?
Follow the algoryth? Don't He a dick or use slurs. Seems easy enough to me.
Unlikely.  I use fuck and shit at least once every 3,4 games.  Never warning let alone CR.

> [{quoted}](name=Gloric,realm=OCE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=v4aohdFO,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-11-02T22:59:24.387+0000)
>
> Automated system that just picks up words, you would literally say "fuck" a few times and if people report you enough for it, it'll likely end with a Char Restriction.
> Honestly, the laziest system i've come across for community management.

False, been cursing since 2010, not a single warning.

>Banned for literally nothing but a small amount of crude humor.

.

>Zaylee: are you a %%%got cause %%%got
Zaylee: get it cause %%%got

Welp. I don't make the rules. I simply point it out. For example, zero-tolerance for hate speech meaning you skip chat restriction.
How is that hate speach.
It's a homophobic slur.
It means homosexual and It wasn't used in a offensive fashion, making it not a slur.

It's a slur no matter if you meant it to be offensive or not. 

And since you were reported, someone was obviously offended by it.

> [{quoted}](name=Zaylee,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=v4aohdFO,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-11-02T21:38:56.637+0000)Zaylee: are you a %%%got cause %%%got 
> Zaylee: get it cause %%%got 

This is a homophobic slur, and Riot has a zero-tolerance policy for pejorative language like this. It earns a two-week ban on the first confirmed offense.
It's only a slur if used in negative connotation. This was not.

> [{quoted}](name=Zaylee,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=v4aohdFO,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-11-02T22:02:45.276+0000)
>
> It's only a slur if used in negative connotation. This was not.

This is not the case with this particular word in the opinion of the majority of players -- and it is from that opinion that the IFS gets its data.

Regardless of your personal opinion on when it is or is not a slur, Riot and the community have reached the conclusion that the word is never acceptable. You don't have to agree with that decision, but you will have to abide by it when using Riot's servers.

> <removed by moderation>

LOL, you can't even comment w/o being rude!
Hate speech isn't crude humor

> Banned for literally nothing 

.

> but a small amount of crude humor.

...  You knew the answer

Even in your own title...

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Is the punch line you being banned? If so than this is comedy gold!
Yeahhhhhh, that's not crude humor, that's just homophobic slurs.
This is a new level of fuckery.
What do you mean.

its called entrapment. you see riot bans you for using words in the dictionary except a small few exclusions. And by not enforcing players to use an automated quick chat with only the words they deem "PG" they can ban whoever they like for what ever they like.

You have this backwards friend. They allow you to use any word in the dictionary, and plenty that aren't in there. Minus a few exclusions that are typically hate speech and/or inviting or encouraging another play to self harm.

Community decides what's acceptable or not.

If community wants to be a bunch of oversensitive idiots, play by their rules or get out, basically.
well that, now I would consider toxic. lol
